
# htan
[![NPM version][npm-image]][npm-url]
[![build status][circle-image]][circle-url]
[![license][license-image]][license-url]

The hyperbolic tangent function

## Installation

    $ npm install htan

## Usage

```js
var htan = require('htan');
htan(-0.8); // -0.664036770267849
```
